parameters.name: VMFilter
parameters.query:
Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| distinct Computer
| sort by Computer asc
parameters.label: Virtual Machines

content.title: Virtual Machine Status Overview

content.query:
let data = Heartbeat
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where '*' in ({VMFilter}) or Computer in ({VMFilter})
| summarize LastHeartbeat = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer
| extend MinutesSinceLastHeartbeat = datetime_diff('minute', now(), LastHeartbeat)
| extend Status = case(
    MinutesSinceLastHeartbeat > 10, 'Offline',
    'Online'
);
data
| summarize Count = count() by Status
content.title: VM Status Summary

content.query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ObjectName == 'Processor' and CounterName == '% Processor Time'
| where InstanceName == '_Total'
| where '*' in ({VMFilter}) or Computer in ({VMFilter})
| summarize AvgCPU = avg(CounterValue) by Computer
| top 5 by AvgCPU desc
content.title: Top 5 VMs by CPU Usage

content.query:
union
(Perf
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ObjectName == 'Memory' and CounterName == '% Committed Bytes In Use'
| where '*' in ({VMFilter}) or Computer in ({VMFilter})
| summarize AvgMemory = avg(CounterValue) by Computer),
(Perf
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ObjectName == 'Memory' and CounterName == 'Available MBytes'
| where '*' in ({VMFilter}) or Computer in ({VMFilter})
| summarize AvailableMemory = avg(CounterValue) by Computer
| join kind=inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
    | where ObjectName == 'Memory' and CounterName == 'Total MBytes'
    | summarize TotalMemory = avg(CounterValue) by Computer
) on Computer
| extend AvgMemory = 100 - (AvailableMemory / TotalMemory * 100)
| project Computer, AvgMemory)
| summarize AvgMemory = max(AvgMemory) by Computer
| top 5 by AvgMemory desc
content.title: Top 5 VMs by Memory Usage

content.query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ObjectName == 'Processor' and CounterName == '% Processor Time'
| where InstanceName == '_Total'
| where '*' in ({VMFilter}) or Computer in ({VMFilter})
| summarize ['CPU %'] = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), Computer
| render timechart
content.title: CPU Usage Over Time
